titleStmt.title: The frog, or, The Low-Countrey nightingale, sweet singer of Amsterdam The Old Exchange to the New Stat-House hoping fair acceptance, a speedy and handsome return, this true fable dedicates.
Holland nightingale.
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.
Aesop.

notesStmt.note: Based in part on Aesop's fable LXXXII.
Identified as Wing A729B (number cancelled) on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1822.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
